item.title: Rural Youth from Jogulamba Gadwal Win State-Level Second Prize for Road Safety Short Film
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: In a proud moment for Jogulamba Gadwal district, a group of talented rural youths secured the State-Level Second Prize in the short film competition held as part of Police Martyrs’ Day on October 21, 2025.
The award-winning short film highlights the dangers of reckless riding—particularly triple riding without helmets—and emphasizes the life-saving importance of obeying traffic rules. With the powerful message,
“Not recommendations… Road safety rules are what save your life,”
the film...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
